items.label: continue()(error?)
items.documentation: Sends a `100-continue` response to the caller.

items.label: redirect(http:Response response, 300|301|302|303|304|305|307|308 code, string[] locations)(error?)
items.documentation: Sends a redirect response to the user with the specified redirection status code.

items.label: ok(ballerina/http:Response|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)(error?)
items.documentation: Sends the outbound response to the caller with the status 200 OK.

items.label: created(string uri, ballerina/http:Response|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message = ())(error?)
items.documentation: Sends the outbound response to the caller with the status 201 Created.

items.label: accepted(ballerina/http:Response|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message = ())(error?)
items.documentation: Sends the outbound response to the caller with the status 202 Accepted.

items.label: respond(ballerina/http:Response|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)(error?)
items.documentation: Sends the outbound response to the caller.

items.label: promise(http:PushPromise promise)(error?)
items.documentation: Pushes a promise to the caller.

items.label: pushPromisedResponse(http:PushPromise promise, http:Response response)(error?)
items.documentation: Sends a promised push response to the caller.

items.label: acceptWebSocketUpgrade(map headers)(ballerina/http:WebSocketCaller)
items.documentation: Sends an upgrade request with custom headers.
